h2_title: Where To Use The Old Rattle-Drum in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The last location is in Sandgate Village. From the Village Entrance Shrine, head through the gate you opened when you fought Earth Wolf in the large courtyard. You will have also seen the horse man here tied to a post. To the left of that post, where he was tied, is a small path leading to a well.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Old Rattle-Drum in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Sandgate Village Old Rattle-Drum Location'.
The content is as follows:
The last location is in Sandgate Village. From the Village Entrance Shrine, head through the gate you opened when you fought Earth Wolf in the large courtyard. You will have also seen the horse man here tied to a post. To the left of that post, where he was tied, is a small path leading to a well.
